author: norman
msg: Allow to set a max "batch size" while do the copy. This allows to not keep the lock for the whole time and so other waiting threads also have a chance to get it. By default it not tries to break things down in batches. See MAILBOX-148

author: sergey
msg: update docs basing on prev. version of doc

author: norman
msg: Add MessageRange.split(...) method which allows to split a MessageRange in a List of MessageRanges with a max amount of items. See MAILBOX-146
